system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.MjNoL6QtM0Nptxsw]{Rifle Specialist}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.q2CTcyiqF0ovbeZH]{Rifle and SMG Reloader}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.6Fp9udJ3zelmnhkl]{Rifle Ace} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.hEyRyjwS4v5mbVyp]{Rifle Expert}

Benefit

Once per round when the character is wielding an assault, battle, carbine, or target rifle, or sub-machine gun, and any character or creature is targeted by any ranged attack, the character may immediately make a single ranged attack targeted at the creature that originally made the attack using their wielded assault, battle, carbine, or target rifle, or sub-machine gun. This attack may be any standard attack, and may not use any called shot attack modifiers. This attack can not cost more than 8 Combat Points. Both of these attacks are resolved at the same time.

Special

If a character has the Rifle Ace Feat, they may use the Rifle Savant three times per round, instead of once per round. If a character selects the Rifle Savant Feat, they may not select the Rifle Master Feat.
system.summary: Once per round fire back when others targeted. Three times with Rifle Ace
